metadata.title: Friday, 27th November, 2015
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    how many health posts, under the 650 Health Posts Project, are under construction in Mitete District;
(b)    at what stage of construction each health post was, as of 30th September, 2015; and
(c)    when construction of all the health posts in the District will be completed.
(a)    when the training curriculum for the Zambia Police Force was last reviewed;
(b)    when the curriculum is due for redesigning in order to equip the police officers with modern law enforcement skills; and
(c)    what added value is anticipated in fulfilment of the above exercise.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport and Communication what the progress on the procurement of a pontoon for Meso-Akawa crossing point on the Lungwevungu River in Mitete District is.
Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)    when the upgrading of the township roads to bituminous standard in Mporokoso District will commence;
(b)    what the time-frame for completing the project is ; and
(c)    what the total cost of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)    when the street lighting project in Kasempa District will commence;
(b)    who the contractor for the project is;
(c)    what the time-frame for undertaking the project is; and
(d)    what the total cost of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Works and Supply when construction of a bridge across the Kafue River to link Mukubwe and Ngabwe Chiefdoms in Kapiri Mposhi Parliamentary Constituency will commence.

parts: (a)    how many firearms licences were issued country-wide from 2011 to 2014, year by year, to:
(i)    individuals; and (ii)    private security firms; and
(b)    what measures have been taken to ensure that the country is not flooded with illegal firearms.

questions.minister: Minister of Community Development and Social Welfare
parts: (a)    what the staff establishment for the District Office in Chadiza is;
(b)    what the current staffing levels are;
(c)    if there are shortfalls, when more staff will be deployed to the District; and
(d)    when motor vehicles for the Chadiza District office will be procured to enhance operations.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)    when the construction of the feeder road from the Senanga/Mongu road to Itufa School in Senanga Parliamentary Constituency will be completed;
(b)    why the contractor abandoned the project;
(c)    what action has been taken against the contractor; and
(d)    what measures the Government is taking to ensure that the project is completed.
(a)    when the construction of the bridge at Sunkutu crossing point on the Luangwa River in Mporokoso District will commence;
(b)    what has caused the delay in commencing the project;
(c)    what the total cost of the project is; and
(d)    what the time-frame for completion of the project is.
